name: ListRoutingForms
description:
Retrieve a list of Routing Forms for your organization.

Use this tool to get a comprehensive list of Routing Forms within a specified organization. Ideal for gathering form data for review or analysis.

parameters.name: organization_uri
parameters.description: The URI of the organization to view its routing forms. Use the organization's URI to identify it.

value_schema.description: View organization routing forms associated with the organization's URI.

parameters.name: rows_to_return
parameters.description: Specify the number of Routing Form entries to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

parameters.name: paging_token
parameters.description: Token for retrieving the next or previous set of Routing Forms in pagination.

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Specify sorting order for results using a comma-separated list of {field}:{direction}. Supported fields: created_at. Directions: asc, desc.

value_schema.description: Order results by the specified field and direction. Accepts comma-separated list of {field}:{direction} values. Supported fields are: created_at. Sort direction is specified as: asc, desc.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: View organization routing forms associated with the organization's URI.

value_schema.description: View organization routing forms associated with the organization's URI.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of rows to return

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Order results by the specified field and direction. Accepts comma-separated list of {field}:{direction} values. Supported fields are: created_at. Sort direction is specified as: asc, desc.

value_schema.description: Order results by the specified field and direction. Accepts comma-separated list of {field}:{direction} values. Supported fields are: created_at. Sort direction is specified as: asc, desc.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
